mapper.sql: select train_id, train_project_id, train_project_name, train_period, train_fee, train_addr_method, train_begin_time, train_end_time, train_exam_method, train_emp_id, train_emp_name, train_emp_idcard, train_work_units_id, train_work_units_name, train_hr_company_id, train_hr_company_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from emp_train
mapper.select: select train_id, train_project_id, project_name as train_project_name, train_period, train_fee, train_addr_method, train_begin_time, train_end_time, train_exam_method, train_emp_id, train_emp_name, train_emp_idcard, train_work_units_id, train_work_units_name, train_hr_company_id, train_hr_company_name, emp_train.create_by, emp_train.create_time, emp_train.update_by, emp_train.update_time, project_nature, project_content, project_method from emp_train LEFT JOIN train_project ON emp_train.train_project_id = train_project.project_id where train_emp_id = #{empId} and emp_train.disabled = 0 ORDER BY train_begin_time

select value, dict_label as name from (select count(*) as value,project_nature as name from emp_train LEFT JOIN train_project ON emp_train.train_project_id = train_project.project_id where train_emp_id =#{empId} and emp_train.disabled = 0 group by train_project.project_nature) as tempTable LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data on `tempTable`.`name` = sys_dict_data.dict_value and sys_dict_data.dict_type = 'train_nature'

select value, dict_label as name from (select sum(train_period) as value,project_nature as name from emp_train LEFT JOIN train_project ON emp_train.train_project_id = train_project.project_id where train_emp_id = #{empId} and emp_train.disabled = 0 group by train_project.project_nature) as tempTable LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data on `tempTable`.`name` = sys_dict_data.dict_value and sys_dict_data.dict_type = 'train_nature'

select count(train_period) as value,c_year as name,'培训课程个数' as id from ( select year (now())-4 as c_year union all select year (now())-3 as c_year union all select year (now())-2 as c_year union all select year (now())-1 as c_year union all select year (now()) as c_year ) as yeartab LEFT JOIN emp_train ON c_year = year (train_begin_time) and emp_train.disabled = 0 and train_emp_id = #{empId} GROUP BY c_year

select COALESCE(sum(train_period), 0) as value,c_year as name,'培训时长' as id from ( select year (now())-4 as c_year union all select year (now())-3 as c_year union all select year (now())-2 as c_year union all select year (now())-1 as c_year union all select year (now()) as c_year ) as yeartab LEFT JOIN emp_train ON c_year = year (train_begin_time) and emp_train.disabled = 0 and train_emp_id = #{empId} GROUP BY c_year
